configuration.title: NG42
configuration.barrels.barrelName: Sets the file name for the generated barrel.
configuration.barrels.include: Configure glob patterns for including files and folders when creating barrels
configuration.barrels.exclude: Configure glob patterns for excluding files and folders when creating barrels
configuration.barrels.fileTemplate: Configure the template used when a file is processed.
configuration.barrels.directoryTemplate: Configure the template used when a directory is processed.
configuration.barrels.headerTemplate: Configure the header template which indicates the start of a barrel.
configuration.barrels.footerTemplate: Configure the footer template which indicates the end of a barrel.
configuration.barrels.useTemplates: Which templates should be used when creating barrels.
configuration.barrels.useTemplates.heade: Use the header template when creating a barrel
configuration.barrels.useTemplates.foote: Use the footer template when creating a barrel
configuration.barrels.eol: The default end of line character.
configuration.barrels.menus: Controlls which barrel commands are shown in the file explorer.
configuration.barrels.menus.createBarrel: Show create barrel (All) command in the explorer menu
configuration.barrels.menus.createDirect: Show create barrel (directories) command in the explorer menu
configuration.barrels.menus.createFileBa: Show create barrel (Files) command in the explorer menu
